trends: There has been one other sighting in Fairplay
There were no other sightings in Fairplay on or around June 30th 1998
divs: sighting detailsi was on some property walking around with my dog. this is about a 1\2 mile down on hwy 9 from hwy 287. as i was looking towards alma(fairplay is also in that direction)i saw what appeared to be a triangle shaped bright light in the sky. there were no clouds in the sky. the shape appeared to be motionless as i continued to look at it for about 2 minutes. then it shot off in the direction of buena vista and disappeared from my view, not due to moving behind anything, it just vanished from my sight. i didn't have any idea what it might be when i first saw it. the only thing we ever saw in the sky normally were planes(always with chem trails). i mentioned the sighting to my parents, but never to anyone else. i'm not an expert on things that fly in the sky, but i certainly have never seen anything to explain the objects i've seen in the sky there.i grew up in leadville, and then fairplay. i've seen things i can't explain in the skies in park county 5 times over the course of the time i lived there. this time was a bit distinct because i could clearly make out the shape of what i saw. it seemed fairly close and low. i also saw something in the sky in leadville with my dad, but only once.
Summary: I was standing outside on my parents property looking towards alma and saw this triangle shaped light hanging in the sky.
